job.title: Full Stack Software Engineer - Vehicle Deployment
job.description: ltstronggtltugtwho we areltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtat aurora were on a mission to deliver the benefits of selfdriving technology safely quickly and broadly it all starts with the aurora driver a platform created from industryleading hardware and software and designed to adapt across a variety of vehicle types and industriesltbrgtltbrgtwere led by a team of selfdriving luminaries and weve forged strategic partnerships with leading transportation companiesincluding ridehailing network uber truckmanufacturers paccar and volvo trucks and the worlds largest automaker toyotasetting us up to deliver the aurora driver in both trucks and passenger vehicles we are funded by amazon uber t rowe price and some of silicon valleys best venture capital firms including sequoia greylock and index venturesltbrgtltbrgtaurora is in the best position to lead the selfdriving space with a team of unparalleled depth and expertise the technology to deliver and the partnerships to build a transformative business for the longtermltbrgtltbrgtaurora hires talented people with diverse backgrounds who are ready to help build a transportation ecosystem that will make our roads safer get crucial goods where they need to go and make mobility more efficient and accessible for all we are searching for full stack software engineers to develop maintain and operate the software infrastructure for our vehicle fleet comprising both offboard and onvehicle componentsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtin this role you willltbrgtltstronggtltulgt ltligtautomate vehicle infrastructure tasks to ensure scalable operation of autonomous vehicles software deployment system configuration autonomous data collection and moreltligt ltligttroubleshoot and diagnose issues in the field hardware or software propose and implement solutions to ensure they do not happen againltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtrequired qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtbs in computer cloud computing environments aws gcp etcltligt ltligtable to troubleshoot complex systems in the field ltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtdesirable qualifications this section is optionalltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtexperience with sensor hardware or other embedded devicesltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtworking at auroraltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtat aurora we bring together geniusltligt ltbrgtltulgtwe believe that selfdriving technology has broad benefits including an increase in safety and access to transportation and to achieve those benefits we want and need a workforce with diverse experiences insights and perspectives said another way a workforce that reflects the communities and people our technology will benefitltbrgtltbrgtltemgtindividuals seeking employment at aurora are considered without regard to race color religion national origin age sex gender gender identity gender expression sexual orientation marital status pregnancy status parent or caregiver status ancestry political affiliation veteran andor military status physical or mental disability or any other status protected by federal or state law your responses or your choice not to respond will not be associated with your specific application nor will they be used in the selection process or in making any hiring decisionltbrgtltbrgtltemgtltstronggtltugtabout auroraltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtfounded in aurora was started by industry luminaries and now were a team with a multitude of perspectives and experiences chris urmson helped lead carnegie mellons efforts in darpas grand challenges then was a founding member of googles selfdriving team sterling anderson worked on the tech at mit before leading teslas model x and autopilot programs drew bagnell also a carnegie mellon alum is a machine learning expert who helped build ubers autonomy effort regarded as the most experienced leadership team in the industry these three bring decades of expertise passion and focus to realizing our mission
